mapper.sql: a.ID_PROFILE_TABLE_RESULT AS "profileTableResultId", a.INDICATOR_DATA_TYPE AS "indicatorDataType", a.INDICATOR_DATA_LENGTH AS "indicatorDataLength", a.INDICATOR_DATA_PRECISION AS "indicatorDataPrecision", a.INDICATOR_DATA_SCALE AS "indicatorDataScale", a.INDICATOR_ALL_COUNT AS "indicatorAllCount", a.INDICATOR_DISTINCT_COUNT AS "indicatorDistinctCount", a.INDICATOR_NULL_COUNT AS "indicatorNullCount", a.INDICATOR_ZERO_COUNT AS "indicatorZeroCount", a.INDICATOR_AGG_AVG AS "indicatorAggAvg", a.INDICATOR_AGG_MAX AS "indicatorAggMax", a.INDICATOR_AGG_MIN AS "indicatorAggMin", a.EXECUTE_SQL AS "executeSql", a.CREATE_TIME AS "createTime", b.ID_PROFILE_TABLE_COLUMN AS "profileTableColumn.profileTableColumnId", b.PROFILE_TABLE_COLUMN_NAME AS "profileTableColumn.profileTableColumnName", b.PROFILE_TABLE_COLUMN_DESC AS "profileTableColumn.profileTableColumnDesc", d.ID_DATABASE AS "profileTable.databaseId", b.ID_PROFILE_TABLE AS "profileTable.profileTableId", d.PROFIEL_NAME AS "profileTable.profielName", d.PROFIEL_DESC AS "profileTable.profielDesc", d.SCHEMA_NAME AS "profileTable.schemaName", d.TABLE_NAME AS "profileTable.tableName", d.CONDITION AS "profileTable.condition", d.CREATE_TIME AS "profileTable.createTime", d.USER_ID AS "profileTable.userId", d.ID_PROFIEL_TABLE_GROUP AS "profielTableGroup.profielTableGroupId", e.PROFIEL_TABLE_GROUP_NAME AS "profielTableGroup.profielTableGroupName", e.PROFIEL_TABLE_GROUP_DESC AS "profielTableGroup.profielTableGroupDesc", f.NAME AS "profileTable.databaseName"

JOIN PROFILE_TABLE_COLUMN b ON b.ID_PROFILE_TABLE_COLUMN = a.ID_PROFILE_TABLE_COLUMN JOIN PROFILE_TABLE d ON d.ID_PROFILE_TABLE = b.ID_PROFILE_TABLE JOIN PROFILE_TABLE_GROUP e ON e.ID_PROFIEL_TABLE_GROUP = d.ID_PROFIEL_TABLE_GROUP JOIN R_DATABASE f ON f.ID_DATABASE = d.ID_DATABASE
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PROFILE_TABLE_RESULT( ID_PROFILE_TABLE_RESULT, ID_PROFILE_TABLE_COLUMN, INDICATOR_DATA_TYPE, INDICATOR_DATA_LENGTH, INDICATOR_DATA_PRECISION, INDICATOR_DATA_SCALE, INDICATOR_ALL_COUNT, INDICATOR_DISTINCT_COUNT, INDICATOR_NULL_COUNT, INDICATOR_ZERO_COUNT, INDICATOR_AGG_AVG, INDICATOR_AGG_MAX, INDICATOR_AGG_MIN, EXECUTE_SQL, CREATE_TIME ) VALUES ( #{profileTableResultId}, #{profileTableColumn.profileTableColumnId}, #{indicatorDataType}, #{indicatorDataLength}, #{indicatorDataPrecision}, #{indicatorDataScale}, #{indicatorAllCount}, #{indicatorDistinctCount}, #{indicatorNullCount}, #{indicatorZeroCount}, #{indicatorAggAvg}, #{indicatorAggMax}, #{indicatorAggMin}, #{executeSql}, #{createTime} )
